head.title: Clinton vs. Starr: Epic Battle Over the Trivial; A Big Yawn

hedline.hl1: Clinton vs. Starr: Epic Battle Over the Trivial; A Big Yawn

abstract.p: Robert Chira letter contends that American people do not care about Pres Clinton's alleged sexual affair with Monica S Lewinsky

block.p: Orrin G. Hatch (Op-Ed, March 29) is out of touch with reality. If President Clinton lied under oath about an alleged sexual affair with Monica S. Lewinsky, the American people will greet this news with a big yawn. People don't care about it.

Orrin G. Hatch (Op-Ed, March 29) is out of touch with reality. If President Clinton lied under oath about an alleged sexual affair with Monica S. Lewinsky, the American people will greet this news with a big yawn. People don't care about it.

The world is laughing at us. The soap opera continues with the independent counsel, Kenneth W. Starr, interrogating Ms. Lewinsky's mother and friends to find out who, if anyone, lied or got someone to lie -- all about whether Mr. Clinton and Ms. Lewinsky had sex. This is grounds for impeachment?
